name: NexusCorp Subjugator
abilities: When NexusCorp Subjugator successfully bombards an asset, place a Raze token on it. The asset is no longer under the control of any player.

name: NexusCrop Decimator
abilities: When NexusCorp Decimator rolls a 1 during an attack roll, it scores a hit.

name: Blupo Tug
abilities: When BluPo Tug transfers to another asset, you may choose a spacecraft in the same orbital as BluPo Tug. If you do, that spacecraft may attempt a transfer to the same asset as if it had 2 extra delta-vee.

name: War7 Photon
abilities: Drone. Drones cannot transfer to another asset. War7 Photon may not maneuver unless War7 Ansible is constructed on the asset it is orbiting.

name: Spaceforce Katana
abilities: Drone. Drones cannot transfer to another asset. Spaceforce Katana may not maneuver unless Spaceforce Ansible is constructed on the asset it is orbiting.

name: Spaceforce Naginata
abilities: Drone. Drones cannot transfer to another asset. Spaceforce Naginata may not maneuver unless Spaceforce Ansible is constructed on the asset it is orbiting.

name: Red+ Mercy
abilities: When a spacecraft in the same orbital as Red+ Mercy would take damage. Red+ Mercy takes that damage instead.

name: The Waveguide
abilities: Spacecraft within 1 orbital of The Waveguide have +1 accuracy.

name: Pollen
abilities: If Pollen transfers to an asset, on the next turn friendly spacecraft around that asset have +1 accuracy. This effect does not stack.

name: Slingshot
abilities: If Slingshot transfers to an asset, on the next turn your transfers to that asset cost 2 less delta-vee. This effect does not stack.

name: Ground Spore
abilities: Troop pod. Ground Spore is destroyed after a successful attack. Gound Spore does not leave debris when it is destroyed. Ground Spore cannot transfer.

name: Sky Spore
abilities: Troop pod. Sky Spore is destroyed after a successful attack. Sky Spore does not leave debris when it is destroyed. Sky Spore cannot transfer. If a spacecraft would be destroyed by Sky Spore, then it transfers control to you (retaining its damage tokens) instead of being destroyed.

name: Laser Broom
abilities: Maneuver 2 delta-vee: clear one piece of debris from the orbital currently occupied by Laser Broom.

name: Floating Screen
abilities: Floating Screen enters play in the highest orbital. When the asset orbited by Floating Screen is bombarded, if Floating Screen is not above the bombarding spacecraft, then Floating Screen takes the damage instead of the asset. Floating Screen does not regenerate armor.

name: Mushroom
abilities: When Mushroom transfers to another asset, up to three Troop Pods may transfer with Mushroom.

name: Dispersal Unit
abilities: Dispersal Unit may initiate construction of Fighter or Corvette spacecraft.

name: Col. Richlieu
abilities: When Col. Richlieu transfers or burns, you may choose a friendly spacecraft in the same orbital as Col. Richlieu. If you do, the chosen spacecraft may spend 3 delta-vee to move to the same location as Col. Richlieu.

name: Col. Jiao
abilities: When Col. Jiao transfers or burns, you may choose a friendly spacecraft in the same orbital as Col. Jiao. If you do, the chosen spacecraft may spend 3 delta-vee to move to the same location as Col. Jiao.

name: Col. Morozova
abilities: When Col. Morozova transfers or burns, you may choose a friendly spacecraft in the same orbital as Col. Morozova. If you do, the chosen spacecraft may spend 4 delta-vee to move to the same location as Col. Morozova.

name: Col. Helmut
abilities: The first hit scored during combat with a friendly ship around this asset is scored against this one.

name: Col. Tejada
abilities: The first hit scored during combat with a friendly ship around this asset is scored against this one.

name: Col. Balewa
abilities: The first hit scored during combat with a friendly ship around this asset is scored against this one.

name: Cpt. Mahmoud
abilities: Maneuver 1 delta-vee: Target spacecraft in the same orbital as Cpt. Mahmoud has +1 armor until the end of the turn. This may not be used on the same spacecraft twice in one turn.

name: Cpt. Kut
abilities: Maneuver 1 delta-vee: Target spacecraft in the same orbital as Cpt. Kut has +1 armor until the end of the turn. This may not be used on the same spacecraft twice in one turn.

name: Cpt. Warner
abilities: Maneuver 1 delta-vee: Target spacecraft in the same orbital as Cpt. Warner has +2 delta-vee until the end of the turn. This may not be used on the same spacecraft twice in one turn.

name: Cpt. Griffith
abilities: Maneuver 1 delta-vee: Target spacecraft in the same orbital as Cpt. Griffith has +2 delta-vee until the end of the turn. This may not be used on the same spacecraft twice in one turn.

name: Adm. Nguyen
abilities: When Adm. Nguyen would transfer to another asset you may choose up to three fighter or corvette spacecraft in the same orbital as Adm. Nguyen. If you do, then the chosen spacecraft transfer to the new asset with Adm. Nguyen.
